{"id":836783738,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 year, 2 months","timestamp":1667572413,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"38 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/836783738/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Reverse Vowels of a String","memory":"7.7 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    \n    bool isVowel(char ch)\n    {\n        string str = \"aeiouAEIOU\";\n        return (str.find(ch) != string::npos);\n\n    }\n    \n    string reverseVowels(string s) {\n        int leftPos=0,rightPos=s.size()-1;\n        while(leftPos<rightPos)\n        {\n            while(!isVowel(s[leftPos]) && leftPos<rightPos)\n                leftPos++;\n            while(!isVowel(s[rightPos]) && leftPos<rightPos)\n                rightPos--;\n            if(rightPos>leftPos)\n            {\n                char temp=s[leftPos];\n                s[leftPos++] = s[rightPos];\n                s[rightPos--] = temp;\n            }\n        }\n        return s;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"reverse-vowels-of-a-string","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
